Token.Abstract: Performs contact tests and notifies delegates. Requires OGWWorldContactAspect to be on the world's aspect list.
Adds a contact test to be performed every simulation step. Same as

Parameter.Name: test
Parameter.Abstract: The OGWContactTest defining the type of test to perform.

Parameter.Name: category
Parameter.Abstract: The test is performed against entities in this category.

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: The delegate aspect that receives the contact event messages defined in the OGWContactDelegate protocol. The aspect needs to implement at least one of the protocol messages.

Token.Abstract: Adds a contact test to be performed at a given interval (in steps).

Parameter.Name: test
Parameter.Abstract: The OGWContactTest defining the type of test to perform.

Parameter.Name: category
Parameter.Abstract: The test is performed against entities in this category.

Parameter.Name: interval
Parameter.Abstract: How often (in steps) the test should be performed. For example if interval is 2 the contact test will be performed every other step. If interval is 0 or 1 it behaves the same as calling the addTest:againstCategory:delegate: method.

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: The delegate aspect that receives the contact event messages defined in the OGWContactDelegate protocol. The aspect needs to implement at least one of the protocol messages.

Token.Abstract: Removes all tests that a given delegate has scheduled.

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: The delegate that wants its scheduled contact tests to be removed.

Token.Abstract: Removes tests against a certain category that a given delegate has scheduled.

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: The delegate that wants its scheduled contact tests to be removed.

Parameter.Name: category
Parameter.Abstract: The category that should no longer be queried for contacts.
